name: @logo-software/table
description: This module generates a table using the given data. The table can generate data using server-side Http requests or given direct data using the client-side feature.

scripts.patch:commit: npm run ver:patch && npm run build && npm run git "fix($npm_package_name): upgrading to v.$npm_package_version"
scripts.minor:commit: npm run ver:minor && npm run build && npm run git "feat($npm_package_name): upgrading to v.$npm_package_version"
scripts.prerelease:commit: npm run ver:prerelease && npm run build && npm run git "prerelease($npm_package_name): upgrading to v.$npm_package_version"
scripts.release:commit: npm run ver:major && git add . && git commit -m "release($npm_package_name): cut the v.$npm_package_version release"
